question:
Consider the following statements about the CASA-1000 project:
  1. The project is being funded by the World Bank
  2. It aims to connect India with Southeast Asia through road and rail route
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: CASA-1000 is a project which aims to bring 1,300 megawatts (MW) of electricity from Kyrgyzstan and Tajikistan into Afghanistan and Pakistan. Recently, two Indian companies have received contracts to construct power transmission lines in Afghanistan thereby participating in building required infrastructure for the CASA-1000 project. Of the four countries, Afghanistan is the first country which has wrapped up procurement works for the project. This project is also being funded by the World Bank.
